dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants module¶

ALl kind of constants used in CANopen or PSPPs

@author: Sebastian Scholz

class dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.ATTR(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Bases: aenum.Enum

Access attributes for data objects

CONST = 4¶

Read only access, value is constant.

The value may change in NMT state Initialisation. The value shall not change in the NMT states preoperation, operational and stopped.

RO = 1¶

Read only access

RW = 3¶

Read and write access

WO = 2¶

Write only access

class dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.COBID(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Bases: aenum.Enum

Default COB Ids used by CANopen

EMCY = 128¶
NMT_ERROR_CTRL = 1792¶
NMT_MASTER = 0¶
SDO_RX = 1536¶
SDO_TX = 1408¶
TPDO0 = 384¶
TPDO1 = 640¶
class dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.ENTRYTYPE(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Bases: aenum.Enum

Object Dictionary object definitions

Object codes and documenation correspond to CiA 301.

ARRAY = 8¶

A multiple data field object

Each data field is a simple variable of the SAME basic data type e.g. array of UNSIGNED16 etc. Sub-index 0 is of UNSIGNED8 and therefore not part of the ARRAY data.

DEFSTRUCT = 6¶

Defines a new record type e.g. the PDO mapping structure at 21h.

DEFTYPE = 5¶

Denotes a type definition

Possible types may be such as a BOOLEAN, UNSIGNED16, FLOAT and so on.

DOMAIN = 2¶

Large variable amount of data, e.g. executable program code

NULL = 0¶

An object with no data fields

RECORD = 9¶

A multiple data field object

The data fields may be any combination of simple variables. Sub-index 0 is of UNSIGNED8 and sub-index 255 is of UNSIGNED32 and therefore not part of the RECORD data.

VAR = 7¶

A single value such as an UNSIGNED8, BOOLEAN, FLOAT, INTEGER16, VISIBLE STRING etc.

dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.MAX_DATABYTES = 8¶

int – The maxmimum number of data bytes in a standard CAN message

dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.MSGHEADER = 'ID DLC DATA TIME'¶

str – Used as header for output of CAN messages

dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.PSPPMONVALS = {'Temperature': 0, 'Voltage1': 1, 'Voltage2': 2}¶

dict – Keys are names of monitoring values and values are their relative position.

dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.PSPP_REGISTERS = {'ADCL1': 8, 'ADCL2': 9, 'ADCR1': 2, 'ADCR2': 3, 'ADCmux': 7, 'BGHI': 11, 'BGLO': 12, 'Bypass': 6, 'ChipID1': 0, 'ChipID2': 1, 'Control': 10, 'DIN': 4, 'DOUT': 5}¶

dict – Keys are PSPP register names and values are their number.

Bases: aenum.Enum

Object dictionary data types according to CiA 301

Numbers correspond to OD indices where they are defined. The free indices in between are marked as reserved.

PDO_MAPPING = 33¶

REAL64 = 17¶
SDO_PARAMETER = 34¶

class dcsControllerServer.CANopenConstants.sdoAbortCodes(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Bases: aenum.Enum

SDO abort codes as defined in CiA 301

ACCESS = 100728832¶

Unsupported access to an object.

APP = 134217760¶

Data cannot be transferred or stored to the application.

APP_LOCAL = 134217761¶

Data cannot be transferred or stored to the application because of local control.

APP_STATE = 134217762¶

Data cannot be transferred or stored to the application because of the present device state.

BLOCK_SIZE = 84148226¶

Invalid block size (block mode only).

COMMAND = 84082689¶

Client/server command specifier not valid or unknown.

CRC_ERROR = 84148228¶

CRC error (block mode only).

GENERAL_ERROR = 134217728¶

General error

HARDWARE_ERROR = 101056512¶

Access failed due to an hardware error.

INCOMP_INTERNAL = 100925511¶

General internal incompatibility in the device.

INCOMP_PARAM = 100925507¶

General parameter incompatibility reason.

MAX_LESS_MIN = 101253174¶

Maximum value is less than minimum value.

NO_DATA = 134217764¶

No data available

NO_OBJECT = 100794368¶

Object does not exist in the object dictionary.

NO_OD = 134217763¶

Object dictionary dynamic generation fails or no object dictionary is present (e.g. object dictionary is generated from file and generation fails because of an file error).

OUT_OF_MEMORY = 84148229¶

Out of memory.

PARAM_LEN = 101122064¶

Data type does not match, length of service parameter does not match

PARAM_LEN_HI = 101122066¶

Data type does not match, length of service parameter too high

PARAM_LEN_LO = 101122067¶

Data type does not match, length of service parameter too low

PARAM_VALUE = 101253168¶

Invalid value for parameter (download only).

PARAM_VAL_HI = 101253169¶

Value of parameter written too high (download only).

PARAM_VAL_LO = 101253170¶

Value of parameter written too low (download only).

PDO_LENGTH = 100925506¶

The number and length of the objects to be mapped would exceed PDO length.

PDO_MAPPING = 100925505¶

Object cannot be mapped to the PDO.

RES_AVBL = 101318691¶

Resource not available – SDO connection

RO = 100728834¶

Attempt to write a read only object.

SEQUENCE_NUM = 84148227¶

Invalid sequence number (block mode only).

SUBINDEX = 101253137¶

Sub-index does not exist.

TIMEOUT = 84148224¶

SDO protocol timed out.

TOGGLE_BIT = 84082688¶

Toggle bit not alternated.

WO = 100728833¶

Attempt to read a write only object.
